title: Into The Darkweb Output
description: Results from Tor browsing sessions. Easy Access returns page content (HTML, text, or markdown). Browser Experience returns per-action results. Screenshots are stored in the key-value store.

results.title: Browsing Results
results.description: Complete results including status and page content in chosen format (Easy Access), or per-action results with timing (Browser Experience)

screenshot_1.title: Screenshot 1
screenshot_1.description: First screenshot captured during a Browser Experience session

screenshot_2.title: Screenshot 2
screenshot_2.description: Second screenshot captured during a Browser Experience session

screenshot_3.title: Screenshot 3
screenshot_3.description: Third screenshot captured during a Browser Experience session
